subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Claressa Shields, a 17-year-old middleweight, convincingly defeated Kazakhstan’s Marina Volnova and now stands as the United States’ last chance at a gold medal in boxing.
snippet: Claressa Shields, a 17-year-old middleweight, convincingly defeated Kazakhstan’s Marina Volnova and now stands as the United States’ last chance at a gold medal in boxing.
